## swizzle4 variable

Places a re-ordered 4D version of vector `a` into `out`<!-- -->. The given coord indices must be valid for `a`<!-- -->. No bounds checking.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
swizzle4: (out: Vec | null, a: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, x: number, y: number, z: number, w: number) => Vec
```
